actions.description:
## Story
As an expert managing my ticket dashboard, 
I should be able to view and edit deliverable details, 
In order to keep my delivery info up to date. 

## Acceptance
- [Figma](https://www.figma.com/file/aBbk2LcaJDpmqlWWfW1bfo/Consilience-Ventures-UX-UI-%F0%9F%9B%A0?node-id=4078%3A671)
- I should be able to edit information for any specific deliverable by clicking the edit button in the Deliverable Details. 


- [Figma](https://www.figma.com/file/aBbk2LcaJDpmqlWWfW1bfo/Consilience-Ventures-UX-UI-%F0%9F%9B%A0?node-id=4078%3A219)

   - If I edit the date of a deliverable, I must select from a list of options a response to the question “Why are you requesting a deliverable date change?”
       - Increased or changed scope/requirements (please describe)
       - Lack of resource (staff absence/illness)
       - Unforeseen execution issues (please describe)
       - Incomplete understanding of scope/requirements
       - Other (freeform max 100 chars)
- Should be able to edit all info except for payment info, but still be able to view payment info. 

![Clipboard 2021-11-02 at 11.02.08 AM.png](https://media.clubhouse.io/api/attachments/files/clubhouse-assets/5e31ec73-2c26-4421-a171-033253ee5cfb/60250eb1-23d7-4205-9521-9108996df1ef/Clipboard%202021-11-02%20at%2011.02.08%20AM.png)
actions.name: Change - Expert, Edit Deliverables Details

description.new:
## Story
As an expert managing my ticket dashboard, 
I should be able to view and edit deliverable details, 
In order to keep my delivery info up to date. 

## Acceptance
- [Figma](https://www.figma.com/file/aBbk2LcaJDpmqlWWfW1bfo/Consilience-Ventures-UX-UI-%F0%9F%9B%A0?node-id=4078%3A671)
- I should be able to edit information for any specific deliverable by clicking the edit button in the Deliverable Details. 
- I should be able to cancel or save changes. In either case, I should see a flash confirmation message.

- [Figma](https://www.figma.com/file/aBbk2LcaJDpmqlWWfW1bfo/Consilience-Ventures-UX-UI-%F0%9F%9B%A0?node-id=4078%3A671)

description.new:
## Story
As an expert managing my ticket dashboard, 
I should be able to edit deliverable details, 
In order to keep my delivery info up to date. 

## Acceptance
- [Figma](https://www.figma.com/file/aBbk2LcaJDpmqlWWfW1bfo/Consilience-Ventures-UX-UI-%F0%9F%9B%A0?node-id=4078%3A671)
- I should see an additional line of text (not depicted in the mock) at the top of the component between the grey line and first field: Request a change in any of the deliverables details from TICKET OWNER. 
- I should be able to edit information for any specific deliverable by clicking the edit button in the Deliverable Details. 
- If I edit the date of the deliverable, a question should appear: Why are you requesting a date change?  
    - Selectable options: 
       - Increased or changed scope/requirements (please describe)
       - Lack of resource (staff absence/illness)
       - Unforeseen execution issues (please describe)
       - Incomplete understanding of scope/requirements
       - Other (freeform max 100 chars)
- I should see buttons labeled Save and Request change. 
  - The Request change button should have the digital signature icon. 
   - If I click on Request change, I should be prompted to provide a digital signature.

description.new:
## Story
As an expert managing my ticket dashboard, 
I should be able to edit deliverable details, 
In order to keep my delivery info up to date. 

## Acceptance
- [Figma](https://www.figma.com/file/aBbk2LcaJDpmqlWWfW1bfo/Consilience-Ventures-UX-UI-%F0%9F%9B%A0?node-id=4078%3A671)
- I should see an additional line of text (not depicted in the mock) at the top of the component between the grey line and first field: Request a change in any of the deliverables details from TICKET OWNER. 
- I should be able to edit information for any specific deliverable by clicking the edit button in the Deliverable Details. 
- If I edit the date of the deliverable, a question should appear: Why are you requesting a date change?  
    - Selectable options: 
       - Increased or changed scope/requirements (please describe)
       - Lack of resource (staff absence/illness)
       - Unforeseen execution issues (please describe)
       - Incomplete understanding of scope/requirements
       - Other (freeform max 100 chars)
- I should see buttons labeled Save and Request change. 
  - The Request change button should have the digital signature icon. 
   - If I click on Request change, I should be prompted to provide a digital signature.
- If I click Request change, I should see a confirmation alert: You have requested a change to the details of DELIVERABLE.

actions.text: Looks good, the only thing that occurs to me is that the expert should not be able to edit a deliverables which has already been marked complete

description.new:
## Story
As an expert managing my ticket dashboard, 
I should be able to edit deliverable details, 
In order to keep my delivery info up to date. 

## Acceptance
- [Figma](https://www.figma.com/file/aBbk2LcaJDpmqlWWfW1bfo/Consilience-Ventures-UX-UI-%F0%9F%9B%A0?node-id=4078%3A671)
- I should see an additional line of text (not depicted in the mock) at the top of the component between the grey line and first field: Request a change in any of the deliverables details from TICKET OWNER. 
- I should be able to edit information for any specific deliverable by clicking the edit button in the Deliverable Details. 
- If I edit the date of the deliverable, a question should appear: Why are you requesting a date change?  
    - Selectable options: 
       - Increased or changed scope/requirements (please describe)
       - Lack of resource (staff absence/illness)
       - Unforeseen execution issues (please describe)
       - Incomplete understanding of scope/requirements
       - Other (freeform max 100 chars)
- I should see buttons labeled Save and Request change. 
  - The Request change button should have the digital signature icon. 
   - If I click on Request change I should be prompted to provide a digital signature.
   - Once I provide my signature, I should see a confirmation alert: You have requested a change to the details of DELIVERABLE.

description.new:
## Story
As an expert managing my ticket dashboard, 
I should be able to edit deliverable details, 
In order to keep my delivery info up to date. 

## Acceptance
- [Figma](https://www.figma.com/file/aBbk2LcaJDpmqlWWfW1bfo/Consilience-Ventures-UX-UI-%F0%9F%9B%A0?node-id=4078%3A671)
- I should see an additional line of text (not depicted in the mock) at the top of the component between the grey line and first field: Request a change in any of the deliverables details from TICKET OWNER. 
- I should be able to edit information for any specific deliverable by clicking the edit button in the Deliverable Details. 
- If I edit the date of the deliverable, a question should appear: Why are you requesting a date change?  
    - Selectable options: 
       - Increased or changed scope/requirements (please describe)
       - Lack of resource (staff absence/illness)
       - Unforeseen execution issues (please describe)
       - Incomplete understanding of scope/requirements
       - Other (freeform max 100 chars)
- I should see buttons labeled Save and Request change. 
  - The Request change button should have the digital signature icon. 
   - If I click on Request change I should be prompted to provide a digital signature.
   - Once I provide my signature, I should see a confirmation alert: TICKET OWNER has been notified of your request for changes to DELIVERABLE.

## Story

I should be able to edit deliverable details, 
In order to keep my delivery info up to date. 

## Acceptance
- [Figma](https://www.figma.com/file/aBbk2LcaJDpmqlWWfW1bfo/Consilience-Ventures-UX-UI-%F0%9F%9B%A0?node-id=4078%3A671)
- I should see an additional line of text (not depicted in the mock) at the top of the component between the grey line and first field: Request a change in any of the deliverables details from TICKET OWNER.

   - Once I provide my signature, I should see a confirmation alert: TICKET OWNER has been notified of your request for changes to DELIVERABLE.
